prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Brass, Pipe, Drums, Strings, Piano, Reed, Bass, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Brass, Pipe, Drums, Strings, Piano, Reed, and Bass, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Brass, Pipe, Drums, Strings, Piano, Reed, and Bass, omitting the Guitar.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Brass, Pipe, Drums, Strings, Piano, Reed, and Bass, excluding the Guitar.
